{{NCAATeamSeason | Year = 1984 | Team = Pittsburgh Panthers | Mode = football | Image = PittPanthers.png | ImageSize = 150px | Conference = Independent | ShortConference = | Division = | CoachRank = | APRank = | Record = 3-7-1 | ConfRecord = | HeadCoach = [[Foge Fazio]] | OffCoach = [[Joe Moore]] | DefCoach = [[Bob Junko]] | OScheme = | DScheme = | StadiumArena = [[Pitt Stadium]] | Champion = | BowlTourney = | BowlTourneyResult = }} The '''1984 Pittsburgh Panthers football team''' represented the [[University of Pittsburgh]] in the 1984 college football season. The Panthers offense scored 178 points while the defense allowed 247 points. At seasonâs end, the Panthers were not ranked in the National Polls. The Panthers had their first losing season since 1972.<ref>http://cfreference.net/cfr/school.s?id=215&season=1972</ref>
